---
title: "Download and services"
---

## Service Thumb
This service provides a thumbnail of the master file in format suitable for machine recognition and processing.

- mimeType: **image/png**
- size: the longer side is equal to **1280px**
- endpoint: **https://herbarium.biodiversity.cz/repository/databot-thumb-image/{photoId}**

## Service JP2
Provides a full size image with lossy compression.

- mimeType: **image/jp2**
- size: **equal to original**
- compression: **quality factor 46**
- endpoint: **https://herbarium.biodiversity.cz/repository/jp2-image/{photoId}**

## Service Master File
Provides the original image with lossless compression.

- mimeType: **image/tif**
- size: **equal to original**
- compression: **lossless**
- endpoint: **https://herbarium.biodiversity.cz/repository/archive-image/{photoId}**
